body: My cousins just moved here and they need a new laptop. My dad told me to do the research and get something max 500$, and I honestly have almost no time, so Ill just let you guys help me. I need something that either ships or I can buy from Quebec.
body_tagged: My cousins just moved here and they need a new laptop. My dad told me to do the research and get something max 500$, and I honestly have almost no time, so Ill just let you guys help me. I need something that either ships or I can buy from Quebec.
title: Need a laptop under 500$

replies.body: Is shipping to Quebec super limited or something? I thought that Hawaii was bad lol.
replies.body_tagged: Is shipping to Quebec super limited or something? I thought that Hawaii was bad lol.

replies.body: No, its just that buying something in Quebec in general is horrible. They tell you your gonna get it in 3 weeks, and ou get it in 3 months. Also, in stores like Staples or Best buy, the customer service is incredibly bad =/
